description: Try our easy to follow Mini Aussie Beef & Bacon Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Microwave,High protein,Mince,Peanut free
name: Mini Aussie Beef & Bacon Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed and quartered
1kg potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Cook onion and bacon in a frying pan over medium heat until brown.
Increase to high, add mince and cook until browned. Stir in flour and herbs and cook for 2 mins. Add sauces and stock. Simmer for 10 mins until thickened. Cool.
Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Boil potato for 10 mins until tender. Drain and mash. Add butter and milk and beat until smooth.
Microwave peas on HIGH for 3 mins. Roughly mash.

Press pastry sheets into Texas muffin tins, overlapping sides to fit. Fill with 1/4 cup of the mince, top with some of the peas and the mashed potato. Spray with oil spray. Bake for 30 mins until golden.
